mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply_order (apply_order_id, user_name, status, certificate_type, certificate_id, phone_number, email, create_time, modify_time) VALUES (#{applyOrderId}, #{userName}, #{status}, #{certificateType}, #{certificateID}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.select: SELECT apply_order_id, user_name, status, certificate_type, certificate_id, phone_number, email, create_time, modify_time FROM apply_order WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND certificate_type = #{certificateType} AND certificate_id = #{certificateID}
SELECT apply_order_id, user_name, status, certificate_type, certificate_id, phone_number, email, create_time, modify_time FROM apply_order WHERE apply_order_id = #{applyOrderId} for update
SELECT apply_order_id, user_name, status, certificate_type, certificate_id, phone_number, email, create_time, modify_time FROM apply_order WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
SELECT apply_order_id, user_name, status, certificate_type, certificate_id, phone_number, email, create_time, modify_time FROM apply_order WHERE email = #{email}
